title: FUCK YOU RIOT. ABOUT TO QUIT AND JUST PLAY OVERWATCH. ANSWER ME.
body:
WTF riot. I've played and loved this game since season 1. But i report a bug earlier with no response and its still fucking up my games. Please answer me. before i quit this game forever. I've spent hundreds in RP over the years, and got many people to play this game. Why let me down now....here is my earlier post...

"Hello, adc main here. I have had attack move click bound to my Mouse Button 5 ever since i learned how to use it. Despite it still being bound to MB5 this hasn't been working the last few days. I have unbound it and rebound it both in games and in settings on home screen, but it won't work in game, even in training mode. I thought it was maybe my mouse so i went and bought a new one, but it's still happening.(needed new mouse anyway) Was there something hidden in the patch notes maybe i missed? Or is this a bug. I was watching Solo Renekton Only stream yesterday and he said his attack move was buggy too. Looking for some clarity plz. I know it's not 100% needed but I've gotten used to kiting with this and my right clicking is bad now that i always kite this way."

what mouse do you use? what brand?

Previous mouse was some sort of Logitech. And when the bug began i went and bought a new mouse, that is BlackWeb brand. MB5 work on both of them, its a bug.....sadly. ANd i don't know how to fix it until it's patched.
it is actully windows update that messed it up, since it was windows riot can not fix it, keybind mb5 on your mouse to . or , that should fix your mb5 button

I also think it may be this. This is a feature I put into the game and I'd hate for it to not work. It was meant to work with left click not another binding. I also had my mb5 not work with new windows update and it's tilting. I'm currently not in the office for the week but I will look into it next week.

Also thanks mother of dragons  :)

1. Submit an actual support ticket (and wait more than a day)
or
2. Buy an actual mouse that you can rebound keys on
or a band-aid fix, 
3. download an application that lets you rebound keys
send in a ticket, it is way too easy for posts to get buried on boards.
They don't have to respond to you to see the post. Many will look at posts and take down notes and just not respond.

It's one thing to receive no response, it's another to rage quit because of it. I mean, no response doesn't automatically mean they ignore it now doesn't it?

I'm not saying everything is sunshine and rainbow and that you should stfu, or that you can't emphasise and remind Riot to fix bugs. Bugs SHOULD be fixed, that's right. But I do think you're maybe overreacting a bit here.
Did submit a ticket....and bought a new/better mouse today. Still same issues. It's only been this patch.
